runs.comm: beautifully bowled! What a first ball this! Tossed up, goes straight on with the arm and somehow misses the off stump.. Shahzad played outside the line...
he stays in the crease and whips this to midwicket for first run
first boundary, doesn't take long. He comes down the pitch and just smashes it past the bowler..
waits on the back foot and punches this floated delivery to extra cover
lots of flight in this one and again, Karim goes straight down the ground. The mid-off is standing a bit wide and he had no chance to stop it
pushed through on off, the batsman comes forward and defends it to cover point
stars off with a length delivery on off, the batsman defends this off the back foot
looks to flick this away to the leg side, but that skids on and hits the pads high
it's keeping a touch low for Kami. The batsman hops on his crease to defend this length delivery, but it hits the toe of the bat
another one on the pads, the batsman misses his flick again and gets hit on the pad. They run a leg bye
he comes down the pitch to smash it away over midwicket, but gets a thick inside edge on to his pads. The bowler cramped him for room with a skiddy delivery
a good yorker to finish the over, the batsman can only block it out towards cover
length delivery on off side, Shahzad defends this off the back foot to cover point
rolls his finger on that one, and Shahzad chops it on to off side. There was some width on it, but the slowness of that delivery hampered the batsman's timing
short of length delivery outside off and Shahzad plays his first convincing shot, slapping it through wide mid-on with ease
wide and it's short too, Shahzad's bat comes down like an anvil, but fails to find the gap at point
short and wide again, the batsman looks to punch it through off but is a touch early on the shot, pushes it back to the bowler
he takes off after dabbing the ball to cover but realises the non-striker is not moving. Luckily for him, he gets enough time to get back

raise a toast for Kami as he skids this one through the defence! Karim didn't help himself by moving down the leg side and using a horizontal bat to a length delivery.. Even in the previous over, Kami wasn't getting much bounce and this time too, it skids below the bat to hit middle and leg
angled into the batsman, Najibullah tucks it to midwicket for a single
he gives himself some room but gets cramped by another skiddy delivery, he ends up pushing it to mid on
well fielded at cover as the batsman crunches this full delivery with some timing, but they take a single by the time he gathers himself
ugly heave by the batsman! This has somehow missed the middle stump as the batsman misses.. It just bounced over ..
fuller outside off, Najibullah is not going to hang around. He gets under this and chips it over wide mid-on for his first boundary. There wasn't much timing on that though
short of length delivery outside off, Shahzad gives himself room and misses as it slips under his bat
another one beats the bat! He is giving himself room almost every ball, but getting behind the line is probably a better thing to do - he did it so well in the last game
caught at third man! Shahzad doesn't learn! He moves outside leg, gets some bat on it this time, but it is a thick outside edge that flies straight into the hands of Kami, who makes no mistake

make it two in two! This is suicidal from Najibullah! Ok maybe the idea was right, but he didn't get any timing as he looked to heave this over mid-on. Another easy catch for the fielder.. Nepal are not fluffing any chances today.
length delivery on off, the batsman pushes it back down the pitch. It was in the air for a bit though..
good tight delivery outside off, the batsman pushes it to wide mid-off for a single
length delivery on off, the batsman looks to cut, but chops it down to the keeper
length delivery outside off, he cuts it straight to point this time
short and wide but it still beats the bat! The batsman threw his bat at that, but the late swing takes the ball further away from him
stays in the crease and opens the face of the bat to run it down to third man
pushes this past the bowler for a quick single
he waits on the back foot and steers this length delivery down to third man for a single
he picks the gap at backward point expertly! That was short and wide, but there were two men guarding that area.
another boundary now, Regmi is being expensive here. He tossed it up and the batsman played a neat paddle down to the fine leg boundary
short again, and that makes a hat-trick for the batsman at least. He punches this in front of point and beats the man at deep cover easily
floated up and the batsman nudges it to square leg for a single
quicker delivery on the stumps, Mangal comes forward and defends
missed stumping! That was wonderfully bowled, completely beat the batsman, who was down the pitch, with the flight. It went past the inside edge and slips between the keeper's legs..
he comes forward and defends the length delivery back to the bowler
back of length delivery outside off, again punched back to the bowler
fuller outside off, the batsman bends down and creams it straight to man at deep cover
beautifully picked over point! He gets under this short and wide one and cuts it just over the point fielder for a boundary
back of length delivery on the stumps, it's punched to midwicket
he comes forward and punches the length delivery to cover
shorter delivery, the batsman goes deep into the crease and slaps it to long on

oh what a catch this one from Khadka! he runs from short fine leg a long way towards the deep square leg boundary, lines himself up and dives to his left at the last moment to pull off a ripper! What a welcome change from two days back when nothing seemed to stick. Huge top edge from the batsman as he looks to sweep. Nepal on a roll here
this one keeps coming in and the batsman wasn't expecting it too.. He manages to chop it to off side right at the last moment..
he comes down the pitch and nicely plays it down to long on
he gets them to consistently come in to the right handers, this time the batsman dabs it to deep midwicket for a single

Shakti takes off on his sprint! Nepal are ecstatic! Nabi looks to whip this to the leg side but gets hit on the pads. It looked like it was going down the leg but the umpire raises his finger to trigger manic scenes in the Nepal camp. Nabi is visibly surprised with that call..Understandably so, as the replays show it would have just missed leg stump
short delivery outside off, the batsman pulls it to deep square leg comfortably, rolling his wrists along
length delivery outside off, slightly slower too, the batsman defends it to off
another tight delivery on off, the batsman dabs it straight to point
nicely clipped off the pads to deep midwicket for a single. He turned his wrists on it smartly to turn it to leg side
short and wide, the batsman ends up cutting much finer than he would have liked.. A single to third man ensues
fuller delivery on off, the batsman whips it to wide long on for a couple of runs
bowls a slider on the middle stump, the batsman nudges it behind square on the leg side for a single
good work from the bowler who runs to his right and dives to cut off the batsman's push towards mid-on
he bends down and sweeps this nicely down to deep backward square leg for a couple
what a strike! Stanikzai gets under it proper and slams it over long on! That is a biggie.. It sails over and over and over the boundary..
flatter this time, the batsman has to wait and can only clip it to short fine leg
slower still from Shakti, the batsman presses forward, waits, then defends
slower through the air, the batsman waits for it on the front foot, then turns it to square leg for a single
flatter and quicker this time, the batsman flicks it to deep midwicket for a single
slower and loopy on the pads, the batsman punches it straight to midwicket
flatter delivery on the stumps, the batsman pushes it back to the bowler
this one is on the pads, it's neatly tucked to square leg for a single
some flight and a bit of turn too! That took the inside edge, hit the pad and lobbed up just enough to interest the keeper. But he had no chance. Good bowling though
give me six more! This is way deep into the stands at deep square leg. This was very short and the batsman had enough time to swivel and whack it over the boundary
goes deep in the crease and punches the length delivery to long on for a single
comes down the pitch and clobbers it straight down the ground for another boundary. Powerful strike this one
short and wide this time, it's punched straight to deep extra cover
he picks this one from outside off and swats it down to deep midwicket for a single
fuller and wider outside off, the batsman pushes it straight to extra cover
bowls a skiddy delivery that the batsman punches to cover off the back foot
no room on this one, the batsman punches it straight down the ground to long on for a single
a nudge to short fine leg brings them a quick single
loopy and full outside off, the batsman dabs it to midwicket for a single
comes down the pitch and defends the flighted delivery to the leg side
a good over this one! He bowls a quicker delivery that is defended back to the bowler.

what a timely strike by Regmi! He tosses it up outside off, gets some extra bounce and the batsman, looking for a cut, doesn't manage to keep it down. Pun, at point, takes a smart forward diving catch. The catching from Nepal today has been brilliant.
quicker and on the pads, the batsman whips it to deep square leg for a single
flatter and quicker, the batsman looks to punch it down to long on, but plays it too straight, back to the bowler
short and wide, he gets on top of this and cuts it past Pun at point for a couple
another short and wide delivery, it's pushed harmlessly towards extra cover where the fielder allows it to run through his legs to give an extra run
more short and wide stuff from Regmi, but he won't mind the batsman hitting it straight to deep extra cover for a single
this one slides across the right hander and beats the outside edge as the batsman looks to push it to cover
looks for the big hit, but doesn't really get under it. He hits it hard to straight to long on
floated up to off stump, the batsman punches it straight to extra cover
he looks to reverse pull this but gets hit on the gloves
looks for the big shot again, but there is no room to get under it. The batsman drives it straight to midwicket and a fumble allows him to get through
it's whipped down behind square on the leg side for a couple of runs
what a good yorker that is! Nothing much the batsman could do with it, he digs it out back down the pitch
another good delivery! It's full and it's headed on the middle, the batsman punches it down to long on for a single
another one right at the base of the stumps, not much room to get under it. But Asghar hits it firmly down to long off and comes back for a second as the fielder was touch slow

this one just beats Regmi at backward point! It was another good delivery on off, the batsman ended up slicing it behind point.. and Regmi, if he was six inches taller, would have got this one easily. Three fielder converge near the boundary and manage to keep it in
another good yorker, not much you can do about those. The batsman digs it out to mid on
lovely yorker! This one misses everything. The batsman heaved at it but it slipped under the bat and somehow missed the off stump too
that is a boundary but it's not a shot that Afghanistan would be comfortable about - an inside edge past the stumps
a good yorker from round the stumps, the batsman punches it straight down the ground and comes back for a second by the time the long off fielder gets to it

length delivery, that is swatted away towards deep square leg and looked set to reach the boundary but Bhandari runs in from deep midwicket to put a dive and prevent the boundary. Excellent work there
he looks to smack it to the leg side but gets another inside edge. There is a man at fine leg for these odd shots
he moves well away to the leg and swats it straight into the non-striker. Nepal wouldn't mind that
another yorker on the pads, another inside edge to fine leg. Nepal have smartly plugged that gap
another good yorker! he can only dig it out towards deep midwicket. Excellent bowling
a low full toss outside off, the batsman looks to punch it down the ground but gets an inside edge to the leg side
oh what a yorker this is! Just a single to extra cover. Not many bowlers in international cricket can do this, but Mukhiya is bowling these at will

another wonderful catch! What a transformation in Nepalese fielding from two days ago! It looked like there was some confusion between two fielder converging under the skier, but Khadka manages to get there and takes it with a forward drive at mid on. It was a high full toss, probably the only full toss in the last two overs, but the batsman top edged it big time
fuller delivery again, the batsman can only dig it out to long off
another low full toss, the batsman doesn't get hold of it; he punches it to wide long on for a couple
length delivery on the legs, the batsman heaves it to wide long on where the fielder lets it go through his hands. That should have been stopped

this is stupid from the fielder! He gets a redemption chance as the batsman repeats the shot - it's almost an action replay. All the fielder has to do is watch the bounce and exactly like the previous delivery, he is not able to keep it in
swings it across the line and gets an inside edge to midwicket and they come back for the second
this one is brilliantly hit in the same gap at wide long on! The batsman waits on the back foot and pulls it right in the gap this time.. No chance for that fielder from long on to cut this off

Malla, at long on, corrects his last two mistakes and finally takes a catch. It's a simple chance for the fielder as Stanikzai lofts the full toss straight down the ground. That shot lacked punch. That's also the end of line for Afghanistan
it's a play and a miss and it gives Nepal a wonderful win against arch-rivals Afghanistan - their first against the opposition in T20s
